name: Richard M. MAHER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole; Attorney General of Pennsylvania, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of March, 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

990 A.2d 725
Richard M. MAHER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole; Attorney General of Pennsylvania, Appellees.
